headline: PPG, PPG Foundation invested $18.1 million in communities worldwide in 2025
summary: PITTSBURGH, February 19, 2026--PPG (NYSE:PPG) and the PPG Foundation today announced an investment of $18.1 million in communities worldwide in 2025. The 2025 funding supported more than 400 community partners and programs that focus on advancing education, delivering community sustainability and encouraging PPG employee volunteerism.
